mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.userId, m.provider, m.password, m.nickname, m.gender, m.enabled, m.created_at, m.ban_until, m.info_until, ma.authority, m.city, m.district FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_authority ma ON m.userId = ma.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.nickname, m.trust_level AS level, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM member_authority ma WHERE ma.userId = m.userId AND ma.authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_admin FROM member m WHERE m.nickname IN
#{n}
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM member_authority ma JOIN member m ON m.userId = ma.userId WHERE m.nickname = #{nickname} AND ma.authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
